bioAsHtml: Hendrik Ebbers is Senior Java Architect at Canoo Engineering AG. His main focus besides research and development is primarily in the areas of JavaFX, Middleware and DevOps. Additionally, Hendrik Ebbers is founder and leader of the Java User Group Dortmund and gives talks and presentations in User Groups and Conferences. Hendrik is JavaOne Rockstar, JCP Expert Group Member, and his JavaFX book "Mastering JavaFX 8 Controls" was released by Oracle press in 2014.

acceptedTalks.title: Building modern web UIs with Web Components

bio: Hendrik Ebbers is Senior Java Architect at Canoo Engineering AG. His main focus besides research and development is primarily in the areas of JavaFX, Middleware and DevOps.
